Class AnimationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs4620.anim.AnimationEngine

  • public class AnimationEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    A Component Resting Upon Scene That Gives Animation Capabilities

    Cristian

      Loops Through All The Animating Objects And Updates Their Transformations To The Current Frame - For Each Updated Transformation, An Event Has To Be Sent Through The Scene Notifying Everyone Of The Change
